verses.verse: The oracle <S%H4853><s%> which Habakkuk <S%H2265><s%> the prophet <S%H5030><s%> saw. <S%H2372><s%>
Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> how long will I cry, <S%H7768><s%> and you will not hear? <S%H8085><s%> I cry out <S%H2199><s%> to you <S%H2555><s%> "Violence!" and will you not save? <S%H3467><s%>

Why do you show <S%H7200><s%> me iniquity, <S%H205><s%> and look <S%H5027><s%> at perversity? <S%H5999><s%> For destruction <S%H7701><s%> and violence <S%H2555><s%> are before me. <S%H7379><s%> There is strife, and contention <S%H4066><s%> rises up. <S%H5375><s%>

Therefore the law <S%H8451><s%> is paralyzed, <S%H6313><s%> and justice <S%H4941><s%> never <S%H5331><s%> goes forth; <S%H3318><s%> for the wicked <S%H7563><s%> surround <S%H3803><s%> the righteous; <S%H6662><s%> therefore justice <S%H4941><s%> goes forth <S%H3318><s%> perverted. <S%H6127><s%>

"Look <S%H7200><s%> among the nations, <S%H1471><s%> watch, <S%H5027><s%> and wonder <S%H8539><s%> marvelously; <S%H8539><s%> for I am working <S%H6466><s%> a work <S%H6466><s%> in your days, <S%H3117><s%> which you will not believe <S%H539><s%> though it is told you. <S%H5608><s%>

For, <S%H6965><s%> behold, I raise up the Chaldeans, <S%H3778><s%> that bitter <S%H4751><s%> and hasty <S%H4116><s%> nation, <S%H1471><s%> that march <S%H1980><s%> through the breadth <S%H4800><s%> of the earth, <S%H776><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> dwelling places that are not theirs. <S%H4908><s%>
They are feared <S%H366><s%> and dreaded. <S%H3372><s%> Their judgment <S%H4941><s%> and their dignity <S%H7613><s%> proceed from themselves. <S%H3318><s%>

Their horses <S%H5483><s%> also are swifter <S%H7043><s%> than leopards, <S%H5246><s%> and are more fierce <S%H2300><s%> than the evening <S%H6153><s%> wolves. <S%H2061><s%> Their horsemen <S%H6571><s%> press proudly <S%H6335><s%> on. <S%H6571><s%> Yes, their horsemen come <S%H935><s%> from afar. <S%H7350><s%> They fly <S%H5774><s%> as an eagle <S%H5404><s%> that hurries <S%H2363><s%> to devour. <S%H398><s%>

All of them come <S%H935><s%> for violence. <S%H2555><s%> Their hordes <S%H4041><s%> face <S%H6440><s%> the desert. <S%H6921><s%> He gathers <S%H622><s%> prisoners <S%H7628><s%> like sand. <S%H2344><s%>

Yes, <S%H7046><s%> he scoffs at kings, <S%H4428><s%> and princes <S%H7336><s%> are a derision <S%H4890><s%> to him. <S%H7832><s%> He laughs at every stronghold, <S%H4013><s%> for he builds <S%H6651><s%> up an earthen <S%H6083><s%> ramp, <S%H3920><s%> and takes it.
Then he sweeps <S%H2498><s%> by like the wind, <S%H7307><s%> and goes on. <S%H5674><s%> He is indeed guilty, <S%H816><s%> whose <S%H2098><s%> strength <S%H3581><s%> is his god. <S%H433><s%>"

Aren't <S%H6924><s%> you from everlasting, Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> my God, <S%H430><s%> my Holy One? <S%H6918><s%> We will not die. <S%H4191><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> you have appointed <S%H7760><s%> him for judgment. <S%H4941><s%> You, <S%H6697><s%> Rock, have established <S%H3245><s%> him to punish. <S%H3198><s%>

You who have purer <S%H2889><s%> eyes <S%H5869><s%> than to see <S%H7200><s%> evil, <S%H7451><s%> and who cannot <S%H3201><s%> look <S%H5027><s%> on perversity, <S%H5999><s%> why do you tolerate <S%H5027><s%> those who deal treacherously, <S%H898><s%> and keep silent <S%H2790><s%> when the wicked <S%H7563><s%> swallows <S%H1104><s%> up the man who is more righteous than he, <S%H6662><s%>
and make <S%H6213><s%> men <S%H120><s%> like the fish <S%H1709><s%> of the sea, <S%H3220><s%> like the creeping things, <S%H7431><s%> that have no ruler over them? <S%H4910><s%>

He takes up <S%H5927><s%> all of them with the hook. <S%H2443><s%> He catches <S%H1641><s%> them in his net, <S%H2764><s%> and gathers <S%H622><s%> them in his dragnet. <S%H4365><s%> Therefore he rejoices <S%H8055><s%> and is glad. <S%H1523><s%>

Therefore he sacrifices <S%H2076><s%> to his net, <S%H2764><s%> and burns incense <S%H6999><s%> to his dragnet, <S%H4365><s%> because by them <S%H1992><s%> his life <S%H2506><s%> is luxurious, <S%H8082><s%> and his food <S%H2506><s%> is good. <S%H1277><s%>
Will he therefore continually <S%H8548><s%> empty <S%H7324><s%> his net, <S%H2764><s%> and kill <S%H2026><s%> the nations <S%H1471><s%> without mercy? <S%H2550><s%>
